title: Free Sample Space Marine
description: A free sample that I painted first as practice
colours: Blue: Macragge Blue, Nuln Oil all over, edge highlight Calgar Blue and Fenrisian Grey
Steel: Leadbelcher, Nuln Oil all over, edge hightlight Stormhost Silver
Gold: Retributor Armour, Reikland Fleshshade all over, highlight Auric Armour Gold, edge highlight Liberator Gold
Black: Abaddon Black, edge highlight Eshin Grey and Dawnstone
Purity Seal Wax: Mephiston Red, Agrax Earthshade all over
Purity Seal Paper: Rakarth Flesh, Agrax Earthshade all over
Base: Dryad Bark dirt, Celestra Grey bones, Mephiston Red banner, Agrax Earthshade all over
